body.name: Neutrogena Exfoliating Healthy Scalp Clarify & Shine Shampoo for Oily Hair and Scalp, Anti-Residue Shampoo with Pink Grapefruit, pH-Balanced, Paraben & Phthalate-Free, Color-Safe, 12oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 18 hrs 11 mins
features: Ideal for oily hair and scalp: This clarifying shampoo and conditioner help bust through residue and build up. Gentle, non-medicated, non-drying formula for all hair types
With Refreshing Pink Grapefruit: This blend acts as a natural exfoliant and adds shine to hair
Gentle, Non Medicated Shampoo and Conditioner: Free from parabens, phthalates, sulfated surfactants, SLS and SLES
Helps Maintain Scalp's Natural Barrier: This nourishing pH balanced shampoo and conditioner help maintain scalp's natural barrier with regular use
body.description: Clarify and exfoliate oily scalp and hair with this anti-residue clarifying shampoo formulated with pink grapefruit. The paraben-free shampoo helps boosts shine and is safe for color-treated hair. It is designed for oily scalp and hair, but suitable for all hair types including straight, wavy and curly hair.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Neutrogena Scalp Clarify & Shine Conditioner with Pink Grapefruit This nourishing color-safe conditioner is designed to reveal shiny, healthy-looking, radiant hair while helping maintain scalp's natural barrier, with regular use.

Gentle non-medicated conditioner is free from parabens, phthalates, sulfated surfactants, SLS & SLES Clarify & exfoliate oily scalp & hair with this anti-residue clarifying conditioner formulated with pink grapefruit Ideal for oily hair and scalp but suitable for all hair types, including color treated hair

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Stuff! A+
reviews.reviewText: I was shocked to look for my standby Neutrogena anti-residue clarifying shampoo and see it selling for $75 a bottle. After figuring out it has been discontinued, I needed to find something new. I wash my hair 2-3 times a week, but use product daily. This is great at getting the thorough clean I need when I wash without stripping the hair. In fact, it almost feels like it has a very light conditioning effect after washing out, so I use twice. Gentler than the discontinued clarifying shampoo. And my hair is not oily, if anything dry. I love the scent - am a fan of grapefruit (goes well with my Kiehl’s body wash). Very happy, will continue to purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells and works amazing
reviews.reviewText: It smells like fresh grapefruit and really cleanses the hair without naming it dry and brittle . Leaves the hair smelling amazing and looking full and Shiney. I can go 2 days without washing and I have super oily hair ! I can wash my hair in the am and by nighttime it's oily and greasy. I have a desk job so I don't sweat. There's no reason for it to be oily. This gives me a few days between washes without that oily look

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Helped dandruff situation , smells strongly of grapefruit
reviews.reviewText: I really hate the smell of grapefruit but I tried this anyway, because it had so many good reviews about it helping with dandruff. It does work on dandruff. And it smells awful aka super grapefruit-y. It seems to really make my hair happy so I hold my nose and use a strongly scented conditioner to overpower the smell of the stuff - a smell which is probably pleasant to other people just not me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Leaves my hair squeaky clean!!
reviews.reviewText: I love that I can use this shampoo once every few washes to remove any buildup & residue from my hair & scalp. It also lathers really well & smells great! I'll definitely buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Your Hair!
reviews.reviewText: I don't always use this shampoo. But I use it occasionally when I feel like my hair is becoming "clogged" with all of the materials contained in my daily shampoo. This shampoo frees up the dullness of my hair, and returns it's moisture and feel. I suppose you can use daily, but I generally buy a bottle once a year, and use it until it's gone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works as promised for greasy oily hair leaving it clean and soft. Strong grapefruit smell.
reviews.reviewText: Works as it should for oily or greasy hair. Leaves hair clean and soft. Has a strong punjent grapefruit smell if you like it. Too strong for me. Probably won't buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Shampoo has to be good for a teenage boy to use it all the time. This fits the bill. I can't say enough good things about this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product removes build up and creates shiny, moveable hair. Must buy

reviews.reviewTitle: Low poo para piel cabelluda grasa en MCG
reviews.reviewText: Me gustó mucho como shampoo de uso diario para mi piel cabelluda grasa, huele delicioso y me ha rendido mucho. Necesito usar uno con sulfatos más fuertes una vez a la semana, pero me agrada mucho.
Tengo las raíces grasas y este producto me ayuda a que quede más limpio mi cuero cabelludo. Me gustó que no me reseca el cabello, me lo deja suave.

Muy buenos resultados aún sin usar el acondicionador de la linea. No irrita ni lastima el cuero cabelludo pero limpia efectivamente. Prácticamente los mismos resultados que pagando por una dermoabrasión.
Un poco caro para el tamaño. Es de buena calidad y cumple su función muy bien.Deja el cabello muy limpio y con un olor rico.y fresco.
Excelente shampoo para cabello graso. Me quitó la grasa desde el primer uso y me dejó delicioso el cabello
